title: Yep Well What Ever Riot
body:
Toxic or not I Really DONT CARE ANYMORE. YOU PROMOTE TROLLS. 

I try to play and am having a great time. Everything is fine but our bot lane Fid sup and Trist get crushed and we are down 3/12 in the first 10 mins. What ever the match is probably over. Now ONCE AGAIN the bot lane starts flaming and crying. All the sudden Of Course Top is the problem. I mean we have ZERO vision in Our Own jun because we are pushed back to our Secondary Turrets and my team wants to chase 1 low health person into a jun i cant see, and im at fault for pointing it out and not going with them??????

Im now banned becasue i tried to explain that going into an unwarded jun when you are behind is NOT SMART??????????

Never Mind That I Just Muted Them After AND THE FACT THAT THE ENEMY TEAM EVEN ACKNOWLEDGE THAT I WAS NOT THE ISSUE...............

Because if the team All Decide to Report Me I Get The Shaft?????????

This IS MY LAST POST AND MY ATTEMPT TO PLAY YOUR GAME. I KNOW YOU DONT GIVE A CRAP AND I KNOW YOU DONT CARE ABOUT ACTUALLY FIXING YOUR EVER DECAYING GAME. THANKS FOR KICKING ME OUT AND PROVING THAT THIS COMMUNITY CARES ZERO FOR ANYONE NOT AFFILIATED. 


Try to be strategic and get objectives = banned

Chase kills, throw games, and flame = silver 3

Thats This Game Now And As I Said You Dont Care So Im Glad Im Out. 

People Say and Do Far worse things than Ive Said yet, Im the bad guy for saying yo, running in to die in a jun with no vision is not smart........

FU

replies.body:
>going into an unwarded jun when you are behind is NOT SMART??????????

Being bad at the game **is not trolling**.

>THANKS FOR KICKING ME OUT AND PROVING THAT THIS COMMUNITY CARES ZERO FOR ANYONE NOT AFFILIATED.

The community does not care for those who show their unwillingness to play the team game in a cooperative, friendly environment.

>Im the bad guy for saying yo, running in to die in a jun with no vision is not smart........

If this is all you said, you should have no problem posting your chat logs to prove this. I strongly believe this is not all you said.

>Try to be strategic and get objectives = banned

>Chase kills, throw games, and flame = silver 3

Again, being bad at the game is not trolling. Being silver 3 by definition means they are not as good as someone in gold, plat, diamond, etc. Flaming is what got **you** banned - not getting objectives and playing the game. You are comparing apples and oranges.
He didn't say anything about trolling lol. He just said that he pointed out their mistakes.

The first line of his post is as follows.

>Toxic or not I Really DONT CARE ANYMORE. YOU PROMOTE TROLLS.

His entire post is basically a rant about why he should be allowed to be toxic in the name of "pointing out mistakes". If OP was to post his chat logs, I can all but guarantee that we'd find he did substantially more flaming than "pointing out mistakes".

He didn't specifically call the people in that particular game trolls, he was talking about in general. There were probably some other games where people were trolling, but he was using that one as an example.
Can you say for certain that is the case? Unless the OP comes back and can verify that this is true, I am also inclined to believe that was the intent, given the wording in the post.

I agree. This game has become a safe space over the past couple of years. If you say something mean (even if it isn't mean), as long as someone gets triggered, you'll probably be reported. Riot doesn't care, they just want money.
I dunno, having a 'safe space' where I can play a game sounds pretty great to me! :D
Well congrats, you already do

Not really, the game is simply supposed to be a place you can enjoy yourself without toxic behavior. Trying to make such a thing is not a safe space. Now if they wanted to make a queue specifically for people to be toxic in, that would be a safe space.

Course I doubt anyone who is toxic would say "Please give me a safe space to be toxic in."
See how childish that term is yet?
Because it takes a lot of brain power to press the "mute" button

I'm not disagreeing you can mute, but it also doesn't take a lot of brain power to not insult people. People can be triggered and report if they want, if you didn't direct anything negative towards others you are probably fine

Toxic behavior is inevitable. You can't just report every single person that is toxic. Just mute them and you won't have a problem. I made a suggestion to Riot a couple months ago regarding the pings in this game. I said they should add more so that people don't need to talk as much (i.e ward here, check dragon, etc.)
Why not both? The rule of thumb for "defending" yourself is; mute, play, report.

If Riot didn't care and just wanted money, why would they pay a team of people to create and upkeep a system that keeps track of it and takes action accordingly? Wouldn't they just leave it like it is?

Can you provide an example of someone who was punished by the system and did not deserve it with evidence supporting it?

First of all, they keep that system so more people play the game and don't leave because of toxic people. Second of all, obviously Tyler1 didn't deserve to be banned. If you don't know, he has like 20 something banned accounts, but Riot recently unbanned him so he can play the game again. There are two reasons they did that, both of which are unacceptable. They wanted money, he is one of the most popular streamers on twitch. Also, they unbanned him because he "reformed", which is nowhere in their TOS. Might as well unban every single toxic person that has ever been banned if you're going to do that, Riot.

Obviously I probably don't need to explain that they unbanned Tyler as a person to you. Every account he had banned is still banned.

It isn't in the TOS because ID bans are a newer practice.
Pretty sure OP was toxic and is trying to act like he was justified in doing so, yet has not shown chat logs from the reform card.

You were banned because you were toxic, nothing you said in the game helped the team but instead, you encourage a negative experience for your team, and the IFS spotted your unrequited circle of toxicity punished you for it. Your last game is never the MAIN reason you're banned, it's because of how you've been toxic in MOST of your games. Always remember that. This game is far from decaying, this game gained over 6.5 million more players in past few years. So don't worry, a few banned toxic players to bring in thousands of more players who play the game for what it is instead of bringing racism, sexism, homophobism, and other kinds of negativity is well worth it. Work on your how you talk to your teammates the next time you play cause you'll be back. Good Luck!!

Why the hell do you think Riot added a mute button into this game? People get pissed off. We aren't angels like you. So if someone is triggering you, just mute them. Just because someone gets mad and flames doesn't automatically mean they're toxic or they're an asshole.

Why the hell you think Riot added a report button? Because we don't want players like you who gets mad and be toxic.
We don't need players ruining other people's game and it certainly doesn't take an angel to not use the chat function for toxic use. People who flames players over a video game are assholes, regardless of your opinion. That's why Riot is warning them and if they can't change, they don't belong here. So, if you're going to flame in a video game, don't play it.

Actually, getting mad _and_ flaming does make you toxic. I know plenty of people that yell at the monitor or come out of a game and open a fresh can of bitch about something/someone. Do you see the difference? They are mad, possible extremely mad, but the are not _bringing it into the game_
chat logs?
watch the door on the way out
